title: Rinkeby faucet not working again?
body:
Is it possible that Rinkeby faucet not working again? 

as in #21637 

I'm trying to retrieve some founds with a twitter but I always get an **No Ethereum address found to fund**  message(https://twitter.com/aubsptest/status/1340407355704532994)
I can confirm the issue
duplicate of #22031
It is not working. I don't know why it was closed. I'm using twitter and trying to get some ethers for the last 2 days. It gives the same message: No Ethereum Address Found to Fund ....
Same issue here. Any alternatives?
Alternatives?
Please send me your address and how much rinkeby ether you need

> Please send me your address and how much rinkeby ether you need

Hi ligi, thank you!
0x33BDc1D4C783E2c052DE5039DE79abcB5d13b147
I don't really know the quantity. I am learning solidity and all the deployment process of contracts. 
I think 1 ETH is ok?
https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0xae672c6ffe2641f5483bbb57d8f3252f47104e4d0635f0d589a598bf7e8e0ea5

Hi ligi.  Can I have all of it please?

0xa780F8a7C4721bbFf6Ee2d3EFD94bf151Cf8006F
If not all of it, 30 eth should be sufficient.  Or three.

Hi ligi, could you send me some rinkeby ETH. I would like to get about 5-10 ETH to battle test the Dapp. Here is my address: 0x353807396Aa42b7FEa5A98d1Da7CEBCDD6e0406a
Thank you!

> Please send me your address and how much rinkeby ether you need

Thank you very much!

And it would be great,  30 ETH  ->   0xb3896bc01B0552d29b1ea4F3997fbD13865a9104

Hi,
Can I get 5 ETH. Thanks!
0x64fFDA7cCADf2Dc82150E28bf5FC214Ce525f535
PD: Im learning, drop the acc

Hey @ligi! Can I get 15 ETH ? 
0x792E85700f825ada50672a8BCbb3913851FD1aBc

Same for me please... 
2-3 ETH would be enough
0xFcdFa85544a3728e99FDF71f9CF2e216B76e6275

If the Rinkeby team is not able to maintain their official faucet alone, please let new members run nodes and mine ETHs so we can develop more faucets... Thanks! üëç
Hi , is the issue resolved , if not can anyone help he with some testnet RETH please . 0x56e2a2ADfcBbb97c8F6dAC6c2B33b74028bAF3aE , I need  atleast 10 RETH @ligi

Hi, @ligi!
0x56668BD0D0F4FAfe2aBF2d1F7Dc0C2Bf1b3933b5
Can I get 5 ETH, please. Thanks very much!

its not resolved for me--still can't get any eth
